meteringCharges.description: Charges may vary, please contact us on 131 806 for specific metering charges.

fees.description: Connection fee (GST incl) for standard move in requests during business hours. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.
Disconnection fee (GST incl) generally applies for any move-out request. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.

electricityContract.terms: This offer is available to small business customers currently within the Ausgrid distribution zone with applicable network tariff. Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. All times are AEST, unless you have an interval meter, in which case daylight savings time will apply.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Customer Charter and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business day prior to the variation.

incentives.description: Get 10,000 bonus Qantas Points when you pay your first electricity bill in full, and 2 Qantas Points per $1 on every electricity bill when you pay on time. For T&Cs see redenergy.com.au/terms

eligibility.description: This offer is only available to new customers
Only available to business customers with ABN and a valid Qantas business rewards membership. The ABN on your energy account must match the ABN registered to your Qantas Business Rewards membership.

demandCharges.description: Demand calculation: maximum interval consumption over relevant bill period occurring between 2pm - 8pm Mon-Fri inc public holidays; Billable demand is the greater of: Bill Demand from bills within 365 days from the end date of the current bill; Network's Peak Demand values within 365 days from the end date of the current bill

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Red Energy FIT - GST included if any

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: The fees and charges listed in the Fees and Charges section above apply to the standard move in and move out requests. For details on our additional fees and charges, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/additional-service-charges-nsw or contact us on 131 806.
